Korcula

May 22, 2013 • Jack

The upwind sail to Luka Polace was enjoyable, but today reminded us of the virtues of being a downwind boat. The 15 miles to Korcula slipped under the keel easily as a broad reach became a wing-on-wing run in front of 15 knots out of the east. We tucked into the ACI Marina Korcula and Med-moored stern to by 2 p.m.
